name: Power Forward
description: Sometimes life is like being on a boat where your not sure where you're headed! Things keep closing in around you, but you have that light on the horizon and you know you'll be safe there!"Power Forward" came to me shortly after the passing of my mother in 2011. A customer of mine out of the blue challenged me to paint a boat in the ocean after I had described what I was going thru. My brother kept throwing around the words "Power Forward"! So this piece was born from loss and rising up!
